query.statement:
SELECT DISTINCT MM012.LIFNR AS CODE ,MM012.NAME1 AS CODE_NAME ,MM012.SORTL ,MM012.LOEVM ,(SELECT X.ZZACTSS FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS X WHERE MM012.MANDT = X.MANDT AND MM012.LIFNR = X.LIFNR )AS ZZACTSS FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0034 AS PS002 ,SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS MM012 WHERE PS002.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM012.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PS002.MANDT = MM012.MANDT AND PS002.LIFNR = MM012.LIFNR -- AND PS002.DELEF = '' -- AND MM012.LOEVM = ''
AND PS002.LIFNR = #USER_CODE#
AND PS002.LIFNR IN (
SELECT LIFNR FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND TEMNO = (
SELECT TEMNO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0011 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = #USER_CODE# AND RETIF = ''
) )
AND PS002.LIFNR IN (
SELECT LIFNR FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND ZZACTSS = #USER_CODE#
)
AND MM012.LIFNR NOT LIKE '0000008___' ORDER BY CODE_NAME WITH UR
